19.eng-name: The Book of the Prayer for the Two 'Eids

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas bin Malik said:"The people of the Jahiliyyah had two days each year when they would play. When the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) came to Al-Madinah he said: 'You had two days when you would play, but Allah (SWT) has given Muslims something instead that is better than them: the day of Al-Fitr and the day of Al-Adha
